description: This dashboard shows live load test metrics provided by JMeter, updated bars charts.

targets.query:
current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Median response time")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})

baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Median response time")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})

join(tables: {t1: current, t2: baseline}, on: ["Metric"])

current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "75%-tile response time")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})

baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "75%-tile response time")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})

join(tables: {t1: current, t2: baseline}, on: ["Metric"])

current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "90%-tile response time")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})

baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "90%-tile response time")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})

join(tables: {t1: current, t2: baseline}, on: ["Metric"])

count_all_current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])

count_error_current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])

current_error = join(
      tables: {count_all_current: count_all_current, count_error_current: count_error_current},
      on: ["application"]
    )
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({Current: (r._value_count_error_current / r._value_count_all_current) * 100.0}))
    |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Error rate")

count_all_baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])

count_error_baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])

baseline_error = join(
      tables: {count_all_baseline: count_all_baseline, count_error_baseline: count_error_baseline},
      on: ["application"]
    )
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({Baseline: (r._value_count_error_baseline / r._value_count_all_baseline) * 100.0}))
    |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Error rate")

join(tables: {t1: current_error, t2: baseline_error}, on: ["Metric"])

current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: 60))}))
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Requests per second")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})

baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: 60))}))
  |> median()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Requests per second")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})

join(tables: {t1: current, t2: baseline}, on: ["Metric"])

current = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Total requests")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})

baseline = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] !~ /TR/ and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "Metric", value: "Total requests")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})

join(tables: {t1: current, t2: baseline}, on: ["Metric"])

current_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: $__interval_ms) * 1000.0)}))
  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Current test")

baseline_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${baseline_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${baseline_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: $__interval_ms) * 1000.0)}))
  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Baseline test")
  |> timeShift(duration: duration(v: uint(v: ${current_startTime}) - uint(v: ${baseline_startTime})))

union(tables: [current_data_tr, baseline_data_tr])
|> group(columns: ["testTitle"])
|> keep(columns: ["testTitle", "_value", "_time"])

current_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Current test")

baseline_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${baseline_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${baseline_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(

  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Baseline test")
  |> timeShift(duration: duration(v: uint(v: ${current_startTime}) - uint(v: ${baseline_startTime})))

union(tables: [current_data_tr, baseline_data_tr])
|> group(columns: ["testTitle"])
|> keep(columns: ["testTitle", "_value", "_time"])

current_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(

  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Baseline test")
  |> timeShift(duration: duration(v: uint(v: ${current_startTime}) - uint(v: ${baseline_startTime})))

union(tables: [current_data_tr, baseline_data_tr])
|> group(columns: ["testTitle"])
|> keep(columns: ["testTitle", "_value", "_time"])

current_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then

  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])

  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Current test")

baseline_data_tr = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${baseline_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${baseline_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "testTitle", value: "Baseline test")
  |> timeShift(duration: duration(v: uint(v: ${current_startTime}) - uint(v: ${baseline_startTime})))

union(tables: [current_data_tr, baseline_data_tr])
|> group(columns: ["testTitle"])
|> keep(columns: ["testTitle", "_value", "_time"])

current_test = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Current", "transaction"])

baseline_test = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${baseline_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${baseline_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Baseline", "transaction"])

join(tables: {d1: current_test, d2: baseline_test}, on: ["transaction"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Diff,ms": float(v: r.Current) - float(v: r.Baseline) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Diff,%": float(v: r.Current) / float(v: r.Baseline) - float(v: 1) }))
  |> group()

current_test = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${current_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(
        fn: (r) => if "${type}" == "transaction" then
            r.transaction =~ /TR/
        else
            r.transaction !~ /TR/ and r.transaction != "all",
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Current", "transaction"])

baseline_test = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${baseline_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${baseline_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct75.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(

  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Baseline"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Baseline", "transaction"])

join(tables: {d1: current_test, d2: baseline_test}, on: ["transaction"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Diff,ms": float(v: r.Current) - float(v: r.Baseline) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Diff,%": float(v: r.Current) / float(v: r.Baseline) - float(v: 1) }))
  |> group()

  |> range(start: time(v: ${current_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${current_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")

  |> keep(columns: ["Current", "transaction"])

baseline_test = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: time(v: ${baseline_startTime}), stop: time(v: ${baseline_endTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct90.0")

  |> filter(

join(tables: {d1: current_test, d2: baseline_test}, on: ["transaction"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Diff,ms": float(v: r.Current) - float(v: r.Baseline) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Diff,%": float(v: r.Current) / float(v: r.Baseline) - float(v: 1) }))
  |> group()

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: time(v: ${current_startTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] != "${current_testTitle}")
  |> distinct(column: "testTitle")
  |> keep(columns: ["testTitle"])
  |> group()
list.name: baseline_testTitle
list.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: time(v: ${current_startTime}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] != "${current_testTitle}")
  |> distinct(column: "testTitle")
  |> keep(columns: ["testTitle"])
  |> group()

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxAT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testTitle"] == "${baseline_testTitle}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> min(column: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: string(v: r._time)}))
list.name: baseline_startTime
list.query:

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "testTitle",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events",
    start: 0,
    stop: now()
  )
list.name: current_testTitle
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "testTitle",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events",
    start: 0,
    stop: now()
  )
